title: WhatsApp for iOS launches group feature to allow up to 512 people – but not in Brazil
content:
A couple of days ago, 9to5Mac reported that WhatsApp had finally released the ability to react to a message. Alongside this feature, the company is also updating to allow up to 512 people in a group and increasing the size limit of a file from 100MB to 2GB.

more…

The post WhatsApp for iOS launches group feature to allow up to 512 people – but not in Brazil appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: WhatsApp is updating to allow up to 512 people to a group and increasing the size limit of a file from 100MB to 2GB.
